title: Skill Node
description: A single node in a skill tree representing an allocatable skill or passive

description.description: Detailed description of what the skill does

icon.description: Reference to an icon (URL, data URI, or icon key)

position.description: Position of the node in the tree canvas

max_rank.description: Maximum number of points that can be allocated to this node

current_rank.description: Current number of points allocated to this node

cost_per_rank.description: Point cost for each rank. Array length must equal max_rank. If single value, applies to all ranks.

tags.description: Categorization tags for filtering and grouping

type.description: Whether this is a passive bonus or an active ability
